message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I believe this split is fair and will save us from the effects of inflation.
Alice, your offer was a bit lopsided. Let's be more equitable. This split considers the inflation impact on both of us.
Bob, let's be realistic. I took a hit with inflation in that last round. This offer is fair considering the time pressure and decreasing value.
Alice, I understand the inflation is hitting you harder, but my offer is more than fair. Let's close this deal and avoid further losses.
Bob, we're running out of time.  This offer is a compromise to get us both something before inflation eats away at the value any further.
